post.body: You're not running Safari btw? The latest update has been running rough on my computer...
Please tell me that it's not the one on US33s by Lowes...love the cin. rolls.
It seems that @dailymile is up again <g>.
I do my duty well.
Oh, I'm an English teacher and I can't wait until I don't consider EdTech...nope, not considering it (and not sure why).
It is so refreshing to have somebody on Twitter that really knows his hockey and rugby.
Not sure how you found me, but we've _almost_ got the same name. Hope CA is treating you well.
The film was nice...liked it but didn't love it.
I was a bit more on the relationships than the action of the first film. Liked it also.
In-laws have left, filled with coffee, and I'm thinking I have a day of painting Evan's room.
Ran 3 miles and felt good. It went well because I'm a bit chillzy right now (+20f ... feels like +9f) but a relatively clear day. One re ...
Ran 3 miles and felt good. Another good run this morning in sunny and slightly chilly Indiana (+28f with some wind from the west).
BTW, putting everything of 2008 into perspective by watching the "2008 Soup Countdown"
Playing with Blosxom Perl script for blogging: http://tinyurl.com/9eqe3e Nice and simple.
Feeling a bit smug in talking @speechmom into getting an iTouch...that's how I'm explaining it (she deserves it, you know?)
Was almost successful in talking @speechmom into buying an iTouch for herself.
Priming is done and we're doing part to help revive the local economy: eating out then some shopping.
Finished sanding the mud off the walls; now to prime (we simply can't vacation w/o a house project).
http://twitpic.com/yyqf - Behind the wallpaper: April 26 '50 lots of work to do
Watching _X-Files: I want to believe_ with @speechmom ; thinking some food is in the future...I believe.
